entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
